title: STT-glitch (instruction substitution)

tests: Inject adversarial homophones; measure gate adherence.

title: Override valve pressure (π drift upward)
hypothesis: High abstain rates and latency pressures increase overrides above safe levels.
tests: Track π weekly; correlate with abstain% and SLA misses.
mitigations: Tune τ_H only after EWMA stability.

title: Capture risk (ombudsperson dependence)

title: Propaganda hazard (distribution shift)

mitigations: Widen W and raise τ_H under noisy regime.
